summary_points: 1.  Stanley Black & Decker appointed Christopher J. Nelson as President and Chief Executive Officer, effective October 1, 2025, and Donald Allan, Jr. as Executive Chairman of the Board, also effective October 1, 2025.
2.  Mr. Nelson's 2026 compensation includes a base salary of $1,300,000, a target annual bonus of 160% of his base salary, and annual equity awards with a target grant date value of $10,345,000.

3.  Mr. Allan will serve as Executive Chairman until his retirement on September 30, 2026, and will receive a 2026 base salary of $1,100,000, a target annual bonus of 150% of his base salary, and equity awards totaling $6,000,000.
